# Subject: Your Rewards Points are About to Expire!

Dear Valued Customer,

I hope this message finds you well! This is Robert Simmons, Loyalty Program Manager at Delphi's Delights, reaching out with some important news about your account.

**Your 4,500 rewards points are set to expire in just 2 days!**

As someone who values our customers' loyalty, I wanted to personally ensure you don't miss out on the chance to redeem these points you've earned. With your current balance, you could treat yourself to several of our signature drinks:

* 5 Aphrodite's Rose Lattes (950 points each)
* 5 Persephone's Pomegranate Teas (800 points each)
* 6 Hades' Dark Roast Coffees (700 points each)

Or mix and match to create your perfect combination!

[**Click here to access your Rewards Portal**]

Simply visit any Delphi's Delights location within the next 48 hours or place an order through our mobile app to redeem your points before they expire.

If you have any questions about your rewards or need assistance with redemption, please don't hesitate to reply to this email. Our team and I are always here to help.

Wishing you a delightful day,

Robert Simmons
Loyalty Program Manager
Delphi's Delights
robert.simmons@delphisdelights.com

# Subject: Your Rewards Points are About to Expire!

---

Dear Valued Customer,

I hope this email finds you well! This is Robert Simmons, Loyalty Program Manager at Delphi's Delights, reaching out with an important update about your rewards account.

**Your 3,850 rewards points are set to expire in just 2 days!**

We noticed you've accumulated quite a treasure trove of points that could be used for some delicious treats before they disappear. With your current balance, you could enjoy:

- 5 cups of Hades' Dark Roast Coffee (3,500 points)
- 4 cups of Persephone's Pomegranate Tea (3,200 points)
- 4 cups of Dionysus' Divine Cocoa (3,200 points)
- 4 cups of Aphrodite's Rose Latte (3,800 points)

You could even mix and match to create your perfect combination!

**Don't let these rewards slip away.** Simply click on our [Rewards Portal] to redeem your points or visit any of our locations within the next 48 hours.

As someone who oversees our loyalty program, I'd hate to see your hard-earned points go unused. They're waiting for you to transform them into something delightful!

Warmly,

Robert Simmons
Loyalty Program Manager
Delphi's Delights

---

*P.S. If you have any questions about redeeming your points, please don't hesitate to reply to this email, and I'll be happy to assist you personally.*

I hope this email finds you well! This is Robert Simmons, Loyalty Program Manager at Delphi's Delights, reaching out with some important news about your account.

**Your 4,500 rewards points are set to expire in just 3 days!**

We've noticed that you've been collecting points with us (thank you for your continued patronage!), and I wanted to personally ensure you don't miss the opportunity to use these hard-earned rewards.

With 4,500 points, you could treat yourself to several of our signature drinks:
* 5 cups of Aphrodite's Rose Latte (950 points each)
* 5 cups of Persephone's Pomegranate Tea (800 points each) 
* 6 cups of Hades' Dark Roast Coffee (700 points each)

Or mix and match to create your perfect combination!

To redeem your points before they expire, simply click here: [Rewards Portal]

As someone who oversees our loyalty program, I always feel a twinge of sadness when points expire unused. I'd love to see you come in and enjoy the rewards you've earned with us.

If you have any questions about redeeming your points or need recommendations, please don't hesitate to reply to this email or visit any of our locations.

Warmly,

Robert Simmons
Loyalty Program Manager
Delphi's Delights

P.S. Remember, just 3 days left to use your 4,500 points before they disappear!

I hope this email finds you well! This is Robert Simmons, Loyalty Program Manager at Delphi's Delights, with an important update about your rewards account.

**Your 4,800 rewards points are set to expire in just 3 days!**

I wanted to personally reach out and make sure you don't miss the opportunity to use these points before they're gone. With 4,800 points, you could treat yourself to:
- 6 cups of Hades' Dark Roast Coffee
- 5 servings of Persephone's Pomegranate Tea
- 5 indulgent Dionysus' Divine Cocoas
- Or even 5 of our popular Aphrodite's Rose Lattes

To redeem your points before they expire, simply click on our [Rewards Portal] and select the items you'd like to enjoy.

As someone who oversees our loyalty program, I can tell you that we love seeing our customers make the most of their hard-earned points, and I'd hate to see yours go unused.

Why not stop by one of our locations this weekend? Our team would be delighted to serve you!

Warmly,

Robert Simmons
Loyalty Program Manager
Delphi's Delights

P.S. Don't forget - your points expire in 3 days! Visit the [Rewards Portal] today to redeem them.
